data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is the first step in creating a light weight, configurable,
    easy to use application server foundation. More modules will be
    collected in this namespace including configuration loading IOC
    decorators and other like support utilities. Interfaces and support
    libraries will be added to support enterprise computing concepts and
    other ideas as they rise. Many of these ideas will come from the
    Spring framework that was developed for Java and is currently being
    ported to .NET.

    This namespace is the logical collection point for these add-ons.
    Currently only picocontainer-like functionality is provided. But
    this is just the foundation for more and more layers.
